title: HOUR 1- Chris Mannix Oct 12, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 1- Chris Mannix Oct 12, 2020
description:
Chris Mannix tells Dan that it was September when he picked the Lakers not to even make the playoffs. Chris says he challenges anybody who knew that this Lakers team would win the title back in September.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
